docs.lead_paragraph: HASHIM--George. The entire St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center family acknowledges with sadness the passing of George Hashim, beloved brother of our dear friend and colleague, Sami Hashim, MD, a longtime member of our medical staff in the Division of Endocrinology, Diabetes and Nutrition. To Sami, the entire Hashim family and his brother's loved ones, we extend heartfelt condolences. Frank J. Cracolici President Oscar Garfein, MD President Medical Board Bruce Polsky, MD Chairman of Medicine Xavier Pi-Sunyer, MD Chief, Endocrinology, Diabetes and Nutrition
